active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a resource-constrained startup, should priority be given to equipment anchoring, surveillance cameras, or access controls for theft prevention? Debate pros, cons, trade-offs, and evidence from standards like NIST SP 800-53 PE controls.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in (ISC)² domains. Topic: Equipment Anchoring and Theft Prevention (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security Architecture And Engineering > Physical and Facility Security Design > Asset Protection and Management > Equipment Siting and Protection > Equipment Anchoring and Theft Prevention). Incorporate these elements: - Learning Objectives: [PASTE FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: Use discussion/problem-solving to inspire applied flashcards. - Scaffolding Layers: [PASTE FULL LAYERS FROM ABOVE] – Tag each card to a layer. - Sources: NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5 (PE-3, PE-6, PE-9, PE-10; https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf), CIS Controls. Generate 40-50 high-quality flashcards following this EXACT schema: { "flashcards": [ { "front": "Question text (MCQ, definition, scenario, etc.)", "back": { "answer": "Correct answer", "explanation": "Detailed explanation with NIST refs and why distractors wrong", "bloom_level": "REMEMBER", "layer": 1, "related_objective": 1, "sources": ["NIST SP 800-53 PE-3"] } } ] } Rules: - Cover all Bloom's levels proportionally. - MCQs: 4 options, 3 distractors per protocol (plausible, misconception-based). - Balance: 25% foundation, 25% components, 25% implementation, 25% integration. - Ensure university pedagogy: Active recall, spaced repetition friendly. - Include 5 formative assessment cards (MCQs, short answer, scenario, reflection). - Make explanations educational, linking to active learning (e.g., 'This relates to debating priorities in startups'). Output ONLY valid JSON.
